sentences.en: A crane was already unloading crates and pallets.
sentences.cn: 起重机已经开始卸载板条箱和托盘了。

sentences.en: A large electric magnet on a crane lifts the skull craper.
sentences.cn: 装在起重机上的一块大电磁铁提起破碎机.

sentences.en: Children craned to get close to him.
sentences.cn: 孩子们伸长脖子想靠近他。

sentences.en: Crane is a kind of bird with very long legs and neck.
sentences.cn: 鹤是一种腿和脖子都很长的鸟.

sentences.en: Must we wait till the crane arrives before we start loading?
sentences.cn: 非要等起重机来了才能装运 吗 ?

sentences.en: She craned her neck to get a better view.
sentences.cn: 她伸长脖子以便看得清楚一些。

sentences.en: The crane and the mother - of - pearl fight to death.
The crane lifted the bales into the hold.
sentences.cn: 起重机将大包吊进货舱.

sentences.en: The crane uplifted the car and moved it to a safer place.
sentences.cn: 吊车吊起小汽车放到安全的地方.

sentences.en: The little prefabricated hut was lifted away by a huge crane.
sentences.cn: 那间用预制板搭建的小棚屋被一辆大型起重机吊走了。

sentences.en: The log was hauled up by a crane.
sentences.cn: 木头被起重机吊了起来.

sentences.en: Then a crane hoisted him on to the platform.
sentences.cn: 然后一台升降机将他送到了舞台上。

sentences.en: They built a crane capable of lifting 150 tons.
sentences.cn: 他们造了一台能吊起150吨重量的吊车.

sentences.en: They lay where they had fallen from the crane, sticking out of the water.
sentences.cn: 它们还在从起重机上掉落的地方，一部分露出水面。

sentences.en: This machine is called a crane.
We used a crane to lift the piano into the theatre.
sentences.cn: 我们使用起重机将钢琴搬进剧场.

phrases.tran_cn: 吊车梁，起重机梁；行车梁
移动吊车，移动式起重机
岸边集装箱起重机；码头区集装箱起重机
n. 行车，自走式起重机

trans.tran_en: a large tall machine used by builders for lifting heavy things
If you crane your neck or head, you stretch your neck in a particular direction in order to see or hear something better
